Name: Heat Haze Amplifier
Desc: A Plug-In patented by Midsummer Inc. It's capable of quickly absorbing high concentrations of Ether in the air and converting it into an amplifying heat wave, as well as allowing one to check their current boosts.
Desc2: This device is designed to enhance Ether adept people's efficiency in cold and foggy environments in the Hollows. Therefore, when operational, it generates "a little bit" of heat in the surrounding area...
